defaultSeo.title: Mengistu Ashebir | Software Engineer
defaultSeo.description: Mengistu Ashebir is a motivated and inquisitive Software Engineer with a passion for software development and problem-solving. Actively seeking job opportunities at top tech companies to further enhance skills and contribute to innovative projects and find solution to real world problems.

heroData.paragraph: Passionate about coding, and making my client ideas come true.

aboutItems: I'm a software engineer based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

I'm a dedicated Software Engineer with experience in leading projects and teaching at Africa to Silicon Valley. I've helped students get internships at companies like Goldman Sachs and Bloomberg. Skilled in building chatbots and improving backend systems, I solve real problems and make systems work better. From a small village in Ethiopia, I've overcome many challenges to get here. Now, I'm looking for an opportunity at Goldman Sachs to show my skills through an interview.
I love teamwork and good communication, always open to feedback and willing to learn new things.
In my free time I like to play soccer, read a good book or play videogames.
aboutData.resumeParagraph: You can check my resumé in the link below.
